column1: Donald Rumsfeld was once a director of Gilead Sciences now producing #remdesivir, and interestingly Wuhan virology sought a Chinese patent of it on 5 Feb. At least we're past the unknown unknowns stage and into the known unknowns. #coronavirus https://www.thepharmaletter.com/in-brief/brief-chinese-institute-files-for-patent-on-remdesivir
